title: What are you planning to build?
description: Type of application do you want to build

options.title: Web App
options.description: Suitable if you're planning to build a SaaS application, streaming service, goverment projects and others.

options.title: Mobile App
options.description: Serve your customers with a native experience of your service on their devices, including games.

options.title: Desktop App
options.description: Mostly used by enterprises, like CRM, ERP, CMS where clients can manage their data on their self-hosted system.

title: What do you plan to offer?
description: Domain area of your application will cover

options.title: Client Facing Interface
options.description: direct interaction or communication with a customer and customers use to connect and engage with your business

options.title: Admin Interface (CRM/CMS)
options.description: Admin can control the entire application

title: Choose Client Facing Interface type
description: Describe the interface type of your application

options.title: Single-Page App (Recommended)
options.description: dynamically rewriting the current web page with new data from the web server instead of loading

options.title: Multi-Page App
options.description: Multi-page Application is a web application consisting of a large number of pages completely refreshed every time when data changes on them

options.title: Progressive Web App
options.description: Progressive Web Apps combine many of the advantages of native apps and the Web

options.title: User Management
options.description: List of features that maintain the users

options.title: Email Sign-up/Sign-In
options.description: (Allow users to sign-up/sign-in to your platform using their email)

options.title: Phone Number Sign-up/Sign-in
options.description: (Allow users to sign-up/sign-in to your platform using their phone no)

options.title: Username Sign-up/Sign-in
options.description: (Allow users to sign-up/sign-in to your platform using their username)

options.title: OTP Verification
options.description: (Authenticate real users vs bots based on email/phone OTP verification)

options.title: Single-Sign-On
options.description: (allows a user to log in with a single ID to any of several related)

options.title: Password Generator
options.description: (Allow use to generate password by system)

options.title: Password reset
options.description: (Allow user to reset their password)

options.title: reCAPTCHA
options.description: (Allow user to verify identity using captcha)

options.title: Social Media Features
options.description: List of features that will enrich the social media

options.title: Follow/Unfollow/Connect
options.description: (Allow users to follow/unfollow/connect to others)

options.title: Media & Content Sharing
options.description: (Allow users to sharing their content,post,images,videos)

options.title: Reactions
options.description: (Allow others to react their content)

options.title: descriptioning
options.description: (Allow users to description their sharing items or content)

options.title: In-App Sharing
options.description: (Allow users to description their sharing app)

options.title: Multi-Platform Sharing
options.description: (Allow users to description their sharing app)

options.title: In-App Messaging
options.description: Enable option to messaging with others

options.title: Text Messaging
options.description: (Allow users to text messaging with others)

options.title: Media Sharing
options.description: (Allow users to sharing their content,post,images,videos with others)

options.title: Reactions
options.description: (Allow others to enable reactions their messages)

options.title: Email Messaging
options.description: (Allow users to establish communication via Email messaging)

options.title: Responsive UI
options.description: Make the UI comfortable with devices screen

options.title: Multi-Tab feature
options.description: Multiple tab features around the application

options.title: In-App Purchase
options.description: Describe how the application will be purchases

options.title: Subscription
options.description: (Allow users to subscribe their app)

options.title: Single Product Purchase
options.description: (Allow users to purchase directly)

options.title: Discount
options.description: (Offering discout to buy their product)

options.title: Coupon
options.description: (Make coupon to cut off prices)

options.title: Affiliation
options.description: (Campaign affiliation program to increasing purchase)

options.title: Payment options
options.description: Setup payment options for entire application

options.title: Apple Pay
options.description: (Allow users to receive appears on your Apple Cash card in Wallet.)

options.title: Google Pay
options.description: (Allow users to pay by google pay)

options.title: PayPal
options.description: (Allow user to pay with paypal)

options.title: Credit/Debit Card
options.description: (Allow users to pay using their credit/debit card)

options.title: Wire Transfer
options.description: (Allow user to transferring funds by wire)

options.title: Save Payment Information
options.description: (Allow user to save payment information)

options.title: In-App Advertising
options.description: The feature to show personalised ads to your users

options.title: Third-Party Ads
options.description: Setup location service options to the application

options.title: Self-Hosted Ads
options.description: Setup location service options to the application

options.title: Location Services
options.description: Setup location service options to the application

options.title: Geolocation Service
options.description: (the process of determining the location of a computer, phone, or other network-based devices)

options.title: Google Maps
options.description: (Google Maps is a web mapping platform and consumer application offered by Google. It offers satellite imagery, aerial photography, street maps)

options.title: Apple Maps
options.description: (Allow user to setting up apple map in their apps)

options.title: Bing Maps
options.description: (Allow user to setting up bing map in their apps)

options.title: OpenStreetMap
options.description: (Allow user to o create a free editable geographic database of the world)

options.title: Waze
options.description: (Realtime driving directions based on live traffic updates from Waze - Get the best route to your destination from fellow drivers.)
